statements: SELECT transaction_id, user_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date, is_fraud FROM transaction_data ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, transaction_amount FROM transaction_data WHERE is_fraud = true
SELECT * FROM transaction_data WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT user_id, transaction_amount FROM transaction_data WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC
SELECT user_id, transaction_date FROM transaction_data WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01'
SELECT * FROM transaction_data WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM transaction_data WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transaction_data WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM transaction_data WHERE is_fraud = TRUE ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM transaction_data GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_transactions > 5 ORDER BY total_transactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE fraud_flag = TRUE;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, registration_date FROM users ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT username, email, last_login FROM users WHERE last_login IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'john%'
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, fraud_flag FROM transactions WHERE fraud_flag = TRUE
SELECT user_id, last_login FROM users WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 100
SELECT account_id, account_holder_name FROM accounts ORDER BY account_id DESC
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT account_id, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance < 0
SELECT * FROM fraud_detection WHERE detection_status = TRUE
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT account_holder_name, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance < 0;
SELECT account_holder_name, amount, transaction_date FROM accounts INNER JOIN transactions ON accounts.account_id = transactions.account_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions INNER JOIN fraud_detection ON transactions.transaction_id = fraud_detection.transaction_id WHERE detection_status = TRUE;
SELECT detection_id, detection_score FROM fraud_detection WHERE detection_score > 0.8 ORDER BY detection_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_type FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT account_id, account_type, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance < 0;
SELECT alert_id, user_id, alert_type, alert_date FROM alerts ORDER BY alert_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, amount ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT account_id, user_id, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT u.username, t.amount, a.account_type FROM users u JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.transaction_id JOIN accounts a ON u.user_id = a.user_id WHERE t.amount > 500 ORDER BY t.amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(alert_id) AS total_alerts FROM alerts GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_alerts > 5 ORDER BY total_alerts DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM fraud_cases WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT username, account_number, balance FROM users JOIN accounts ON users.user_id = accounts.user_id;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
